alert.note: Alert for Henry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 1:40PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Shelby and south central Henry Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 139 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of New Castle, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Shelby and south central Henry Counties, including the following locations... North Pleasureville, Defoe, Cropper, Bethlehem, Elmburg, Eminence, Pleasureville and Bellview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
